 One little diffence from all previous merges. This will not be 2 
sparks. This will be 1 spark and some copied datatracks.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> merged and fused are the same thing. 
> 
> Fuse- to blend thoroughly by or as if by melting together : COMBINE 
> 
> Merge-
>  1 archaic : to plunge or engulf in something : IMMERSE
> 
>  2 : to cause to combine, unite, or coalesce
> 
>  3 : to blend gradually by stages that blur distinctions
> 
> verb intransitive
> 
>  1 : to become combined into one
> 
>  2 : to blend or come together without abrupt change <merging 
traffic>
